taskbody.context: This procedure determines whether a hosts's hardware resources and operating system are sufficient to serve as a master host.
Perform this procedure on the primary node and on the secondary node.

step.cmd: Log in to the candidate host .

step.stepresult: If the result includes 7.0, select another host or upgrade the operating system.

step.cmd: Determine whether required packages are installed.
